mapper.select: select * from crew order by crewscore desc limit 3;

SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crew c2 WHERE c2.crewscore > c1.crewscore) + 1 AS myrank, (select count(*) from member where crewSeq= #{crewSeq}) as crewMemberCnt
FROM crew c1 WHERE crewSeq = #{crewSeq}
mapper.update: update crew SET crewScore=crewScore+#{score} where crewSeq=#{crewSeq}
update crew SET crewScore=crewScore-#{score} where crewSeq=#{crewSeq}
mapper.select: select sum(score) from crewpoint where crewSeq=#{crewSeq};
mapper.update: update crew set crewLevel = crewLevel+1 where crewSeq=#{crewSeq}
